text:
Subscribe to our Daily Wrap Premium Join Forexlive News Updates Join Forexlive FX & Crypto Chat Follow us on Twitter Follow Us on Facebook The Nasdaq is hitting fresh highs, up 125 points or 0.8% to 15,916. The jump comes despite sharp drops in shares of Expedia and Take Two Interactive after earnings. It's not being led by the usual names either as Applied Materials +4.3% and KLA Corp +3.2% lead the way with NVDA (no surprise) not far behind.
